summary.para: Defines the WS-Trust specification version to be used with message security and mixed-mode security.

remarks.para: Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2: WWSAPI only supports Ws-Trust and Ws-SecureConversation as defined by Lightweight Web Services Security Profile (LWSSP). For details regarding Microsoft's implementation please see the MESSAGE Syntax section of LWSSP.

summary.para: WS-Trust with the specification URI of http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/trust
WS-Trust 1.3 with the specification URI of http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-trust/200512
